dataset_metrics_flink.alias: [DATASET]: Detected high rate of invalid data than expected
dataset_metrics_flink.description: A high rate of invalid data can disrupt processing pipeline reduce data quality and lead to inaccurate insights in downstream analytics and reporting

dataset_metrics_flink.alias: [DATASET]: Detected higher rate of duplicate data than expected
dataset_metrics_flink.description: A higher rate of duplicate data can inflate storage usage and impact the accuracy of reports and downstream data processing.

dataset_metrics_flink.alias: [DATASET]: Detected higher incidence of failures during data enrichment.
dataset_metrics_flink.description: Frequent data enrichment failures can cause incomplete data and affect downstream analytics accuracy.

dataset_metrics_flink.alias: [DATASET]: Detected higher incidence of failures during data transformations.
dataset_metrics_flink.description: Frequent transformation failures can lead to unmasked or unencrypted data risking data security and analytics reliability
